nodes.text: Livno III, also known as Livno, was a largely undiscovered planet located in the galaxy's Wild Space that was the homeworld of the Lynna species. According to Midnight, Lando Calrissian claimed he had once been awarded the title Savior of Livno III.

Livno III was too far away from a source of sunlight and was facing ruin, but Lynna were saved by an ancient group called The Architects through the construction of Breeze, Rain, and Solstice Globes. Together, the globes powered a machine which regulated the planet's environment within a partially underground chamber called the Chamber of the Sun.
